content: NEW YORK  Nov 17 US leveraged loan investors are waiting to see whether President-elect Donald Trump will follow through on campaign pledges for sweeping policy changes before significantly changing their strategies or portfolios.
name: Eaton Vance Corporation
title: LPC: US loan investors conservative pending Trump policy details

content: NEW YORK  Nov 16 Kathleen Gaffney  co-director of investment-grade fixed income at $343 billion investment firm Eaton Vance  said on Wednesday that she was looking to buy high-yield bonds in the cyclical sector after a potential selloff and that she was bullish on high-yield energy names on the view that oil prices would stay within a range of $45 to $60 a barrel.
name: Eaton Vance Corporation
title: REUTERS SUMMIT-Eaton Vance's Gaffney looking to buy cyclical high-yield bonds

content: BOSTON Eaton Vance Corp on Friday said it will take over Calvert Investment Management  once a trailblazer in socially responsible investing that lately has struggled with customer withdrawals and mispriced bonds.
name: Eaton Vance Corporation
title: Eaton Vance taking over responsible-investment manager Calvert

content: BOSTON  Oct 21 Eaton Vance Corp on Friday said it will take over Calvert Investment Management  which runs $12.3 billion and is one of the best-known firms investing with an eye on environmental  social and governance factors.

content: Nov 3 Wall Street securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several U.S.-listed companies  including Hewlett Packard Enterprise and Valeant Pharmaceuticals  on Tuesday.           HIGHLIGHTS     * Goodrich Petroleum  Magnum Hunter : FBR cuts to market perform       * Eaton Vance Corp : Susquehanna cuts to negative from neutral           * Altria Group Inc : RBC cuts to sector perform from outperform       * Consol Energy Inc : Deutsche Bank cuts to sell from hold

title: U.S. RESEARCH ROUNDUP-Eaton Vance  Consol Energy  Altria

content: July 27 The Securities and Exchange Commission is denying a second application from Precidian Investments to launch non-transparent active exchange-traded funds  according to a letter from the SEC disclosed Monday.

title: UPDATE 1-SEC to reject second application by Precidian for non-transparent ETFs

content: NEW YORK  July 13 Investors in Puerto Rico hope to get specific information about how the commonwealth plans to restructure debt when government officials meet with creditors on Monday  but there are fears that any bungled messaging could knock bond prices.
name: Eaton Vance Corporation
title: Puerto Rico investors seek answers in Monday's creditor meeting

content: In an unprecedented move  Eaton Vance Corp will offer to help some brokerages pay their technology costs to make the fund company's new breed of exchange-traded funds available to investors  Tom Faust  Eaton's chief executive officer  told Reuters this week.
name: Eaton Vance Corporation
title: Exclusive: Eaton Vance to help cover broker costs on new ETFs

content: NEW YORK  Feb 3 Gamco Investors Inc  the asset manager headed by Mario Gabelli  said on Tuesday it plans to adopt Eaton Vance Corp's new breed of active exchange-traded funds that can keep their holdings under wraps for months at a time.

title: Gabelli to adopt Eaton Vance's new breed of exchange-traded funds
